title: an amazing perfectly well made nightmare that will stay with you forever
review: I am sure many others had said all the great things that needed to be said about this movie,i will just add my personal opinion about this is a very unique movie that i will not dare to watch again not because i can't cause i am a big horror movie fan ,but this movie is disturbingly beautiful on many deep levels that it is almost nightmare that sticks to your deep Conscious ,it has been a very long time since i saw it and i remember its deeply in my guts , as a horror fan we need more movies like this ,it was a beautiful well made movie thats sinks deep into your Consciousness
